Class BonjourBrowserSingleServiceListener

java.lang.Object
BonjourBrowserSingleServiceListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.apple.dnssd.BaseListener, com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener, com.apple.dnssd.ResolveListener
public class BonjourBrowserSingleServiceListener extends Object implements com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener, com.apple.dnssd.ResolveListener
Class for implementation of a listener for specific service advertisements. Discovers individual service instances and resolves their details.

  • Constructor Details

    • BonjourBrowserSingleServiceListener

      public BonjourBrowserSingleServiceListener(BonjourBrowserInterface guiIntf)
      Constructs a new BonjourBrowserSingleServiceListener. Implements a listener for specific service advertisements.
      Parameters:
      guiIntf - BonjourBrowserInterface instance of the browser (must not be null)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if guiIntf is null

      Called when a browse or resolve operation fails.

      Parameters:
      service - DNSSDService instance that failed
      errorCode - the error code

    • serviceFound

      public void serviceFound(com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDService browser, int flags, int ifIndex, String serviceName, String regType, String domain)
      Called when a service is discovered.
      Specified by:
      serviceFound in interface com.apple.dnssd.BrowseListener
      Parameters:
      browser - DNSSDService instance
      flags - flags for use
      ifIndex - interface index
      serviceName - the service provider name
      regType - the service type
      domain - the service provider domain

    • serviceResolved

      public void serviceResolved(com.apple.dnssd.DNSSDService resolver, int flags, int ifIndex, String fullName, String hostName, int port, com.apple.dnssd.TXTRecord txtRecord)
      Called when a service is resolved.
      Specified by:
      serviceResolved in interface com.apple.dnssd.ResolveListener
      Parameters:
      resolver - DNSSDService instance (the resolver that completed)
      flags - flags for use
      ifIndex - interface index
      fullName - the service provider full name
      hostName - the service provider hostname
      port - the service provider port
      txtRecord - the service provider TXT record

    • hasActiveResolvers

      public boolean hasActiveResolvers()
      Checks if there are any active resolvers.
      Returns:
      true if there are active resolvers

      public int getActiveResolverCount()

    • setDebugEnabled

      public static void setDebugEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable debug logging.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true to enable debug logging

    • stopAllResolvers

      public void stopAllResolvers()
      Stops all active resolvers and releases resources. Also clears the seen services set to allow fresh discovery on next subscription.
